string-array.name: floatsetting_tips
string-array.item: Lock the application in the background in order to prevent be shut down.
When you lock the floating window in the horizon mode, the location will not change if you spin your mobilephone again.
Unlocked floating window will back to the initial position after you restart the application.
You can adjust whether to show the window in the edit tab in management interface.
If the floating window close to the top and cannot be removed, you can unlock it and restart your application.
Open the About Us interface, you can join our QQ group to feedback quickly.
It will not disturb your operate on the application used currently when the floating window is locked.
Your application does not show the floating window and always crashes? \n Maybe you forget to give the floating window permissions.
You can find more uses in the global settings.
Is the power consumption too large? Close useless service in the global settings.
If the floating windows are slow in reacting, you should close too much floating windows.
You can set the transparent color through hexadecimal color code.
Color has always been transparent? You can change it back through hexadecimal color code.
Use Dynamic Word with sensors will use a lot of battery.
If you do not use Dynamic Word, you can close its service in Global Settings
You can set your own font in Global Settings.
You can also lock the float text by long click at it

string-array.name: floatsetting_dynamic_name
string-array.item: The date of the countdown(custom date)
The date of the countdown(custom date)
The date of the countdown(custom date)
The date of the countdown(custom date)
The latest notification(*)\n[Android 4.3 and above must open Notification Listener Service]
